thread.title: ‘The Bastard Executioner’ Review: A Ripping Yarn but Mind the Spilled Guts
thread.title_full: ‘The Bastard Executioner’ Review: A Ripping Yarn but Mind the Spilled Guts - WSJ

author: Nancy deWolf Smith
title: ‘The Bastard Executioner’ Review: A Ripping Yarn but Mind the Spilled Guts
text:
Never let it be said that “The Bastard Executioner” fails to deliver on the promise of its title. The new drama, set in early 14th century Wales, is full of horrific violence even without any official decapitations, including one achieved by a blade swing so mighty that initially the prisoner looks unharmed—until the head slides slowly off its stalk.
Fans of the new show, and there will be fans, can point out that the blood does not flow into an entertainment vessel that is completely empty of redeeming social value.... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
